snippet: The Philippines capital and its suburbs were submerged on Tuesday as torrential rains battered the city and floodwaters poured in from almost all sides.
abstract: Torrential monsoon rains and floodwaters continue to batter the overpopulated capital city of Manila, Philippines, leaving at least a third of the area underwater; more than 50 people have died and 250,000 have been evacuated, even as rescue workers attempt to aid those who remain.
lead_paragraph: The Philippines capital and its suburbs were submerged on Tuesday as torrential rains battered the city and floodwaters poured in from almost all sides.

headline.seo: Rains Flood a Third of Manila Area as Many Flee
headline.main: Rains Flood a Third of Manila Area, Displacing Thousands
headline.print_headline: Rains Flood a Third of Manila Area, Displacing Thousands
